Workflow.Name: Meeting Room Services - Send email notifications
Workflow.Description:
This flow is used in Meeting Room Service - When a service is requested or updated, Auto notify admin when a new issue is submitted.
Purpose of this flow is to facilitate the sending of email notification to respective administrators:
For service request - the service admin team
For issues - the reported issues team
